SEARCH

Package com.nonsense.languageweb

package com.nonsense.languageweb
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Adjective
    The Adjective class represents a randomly selected adjective from a file.
    LanguagewebApplication
    Main entry point for the Spring Boot application "Languageweb".
    NonsenseApplication
    Main controller for the Nonsense Language Web application.
    Noun
    The Noun class represents a randomly selected noun from a file.
    SyntaxAnalyzer
    A utility class that uses the Google Cloud Natural Language API to analyze the syntax of a given sentence.
    SyntaxAnalyzer.SyntaxResult
    A container class to store the results of the syntax analysis.
    TemplateFiller
    The TemplateFiller class provides functionality to dynamically fill sentence templates with randomly selected nouns, verbs, and adjectives.
    TemplateSelector
    The TemplateSelector class is responsible for selecting a sentence template that is compatible with the provided lists of nouns, verbs, and adjectives.
    Verb
    The Verb class represents a randomly selected verb from a file.
